summary.span: 定义图形图元文件。

span.span: Defines a graphic metafile.

summary.span: 图元文件包含描述一系列图形操作的记录，这些操作可被记录（构造）和回放（显示）。

span.span: A metafile contains records that describe a sequence of graphics operations that can be recorded (constructed) and played back (displayed).

summary.span: 此类不能继承。

span.span: This class is not inheritable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用 方法将图形图像保存为 Windows 图元文件格式（WMF）或增强型图元文件格式（EMF）文件时，生成的文件将另存为可移植网络图形（PNG）文件。When you use the method to save a graphic image as a Windows Metafile Format (WMF) or Enhanced Metafile Format (EMF) file, the resulting file is saved as a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) file instead. 出现此行为是因为 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 组件没有可用于将文件另存为 .wmf 或 .emf 文件的编码器。This behavior occurs because the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] component of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] does not have an encoder that you can use to save files as .wmf or .emf files. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 和使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a and use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile/VB/Form1.vb#1)]
